opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Benitez v. Mata, Interim Field Office Director, Miami, Immigration and Customs Enforcement

opinion:
541 U.S. 1084

BENITEZ
v.
MATA, INTERIM FIELD OFFICE DIRECTOR, MIAMI, IMMIGRATION AND CUSTOMS ENFORCEMENT.

No. 03-7434.

Supreme Court of United States.

June 7, 2004.

1

C. A. 11th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 540 U. S. 1147.] Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel granted. John S. Mills, Esq., of Jacksonville, Fla., is appointed to serve as counsel for petitioner in this case.
